title: Foul Tentacle (2C58)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Minion • Creature
Strength:	4
Vitality:	1
Site:	4
Game Text:	Tentacle. When you play this minion, you may play a tentacle from your draw deck. This minion may not bear possessions and is discarded if not at a marsh.
Lore:	“Its fingered end had hold of Frodo's foot, and was dragging him into the water.”
Rarity:	C
